works.description: Michael Spreeman, founder of Spreeman Piano Innovations, is renowned for making custom Ravenscroft pianos that take years to build. One of the world’s few custom piano makers, Michael Spreeman is currently making a $275,000 custom-made piano for the Tempe Center for the Arts. The Ravenscroft Piano is one of the few ever made and the first of its kind in a performance venue. The 9-foot, 1,200-pound Ravenscroft 275 grand piano is being built in his Scottsdale studio.
